column1: Smoque BBQ////The pulled pork is great. So is the sausage. Tender and tasty. The platters win over the sammies
column2: because you get TWO sides instead of one. The sides are great. Mac and cheese and peach cobbler are at the top of the list. You get a ton of fries if you pick that one
column3: so maybe plan to share that side. The cole slaw is really good- sweet and tangy but not creamy. Don't forget to BYOB if that's your thang. And don't forget to come at an off time
column4: before the dinner rush. But even if you find yourself in a crowd - this place is run quite efficiently.
